post.body: No games yet, but they're definitely on my list!
Are the negative things still true?
You remembered that you forgot, and that's what matters :)
sweet, please keep us posted on how it goes
thanks
Yup, everything still has that new smell ;)
Thanks Joshua, new job is with Hyro http://www.hyro.com/
I start at Hyro next week, they're in Surry Hills
thanks Luke, probably going to all happen tomorrow morning!
very cool. Play that :)
Play the game! What is it?
site's back up, WooHoo!
Second, after Digsby :)
Send some over here please!
TMBG FTW!
Goin' home
WooHoo, I'm getting a Wii!
Optimising LINQ queries
Yay, internet is actually working now!
Back at work after 2 weeks off for new baby & new house. Starting a new job next week
Wife & new baby are home safe now, having a little nap
New baby Sabrina born yesterday at 11:30 PM mum & bub doing well
My wife's contractions are running at 7 minutes apart
A parent at my daughter's school was wearing a Dr Horrible Tshirt yesterday when we were picking the kids up.
Been watching old DAAS clips on YouTube. Now I'm going to have 'Friends' running around in my head all day
Been watching old DAAS clips on YouTube. Now I'm going to have 'Friends' running around in my head all day
Madman have a 50% sale on, but their site is down http://madman.com.au
FriendFeed is broken! :(
Yay Dr Horrible DVD available. Boo!!!!! It's only in NTSC? WHat about the rest of us Joss?!?!? http://is.gd/agfv
Yay Dr Horrible DVD available. Boo!!!!! It's only in NTSC? WHat about the rest of us Joss?!?!? http://is.gd/agfv
Just started my new job, getting the computer setup
Got a tree cloging our sewer pipe. Going to cost > $3000 to fix!
Mucking with MVC & JQuery
Trying the new ad-supported FeedDemon http://tinyurl.com/55mdbn seems fairly painless so far. And it has shiny new fade effects!
Thanking my wife for letting me sleep last night
Distracted Gamer is now running on WP 2.7 http://tinyurl.com/5r4fp3 I really like the new admin interface, much cleaner
bus driver nearly missed a stop, people had to yell to get him to stop
Days till I can open the Wii: 4
Days till I can open the Wii: 6
jQuery Validation plugin is driving me up the wall, can anyone help? http://snipr.com/8uzsk
going home
Australian Classifications Review Board reverses previous decision and grants FEAR2 a MA15+ rating http://snipr.com/8rhg2
Zero Punctuation: Sonic Unleashed http://is.gd/caoK no surprise he hates it
Days till I can open the Wii: 7
Cool, new Windows Live Writer Release Candidate http://windowslivewriter.spaces.live.com/Blog/cns!D85741BB5E0BE8AA!1581.entry
